item.description:
Warm up those rusty joints in the sun!

Formerly: "Rain Rain Go Away - We All Want to Play - Informal Tennis Sunday"

Initially, there was a 40% chance of rain in the forecast - which luckily has moved to the evening and instead now it's party sunny with a high of 71°F. If for some reason, the weather looks questionable, I will email RSVPed members 45 minutes before the scheduled meetup time to let everyone know whether it is still on or cancelled.

 

Since it's still early in the season, we'll begin with a later start time for now and transition to an earlier start time once it warms up a bit more - eventually 8:30 AM, the same as last year.


These weekend Meetups are informal and unstructured - show up and play with whoever else shows up. Open to all levels.

 

If anyone wants to volunteer to organize and/or host any of the meetups, please let us know.
item.name: Informal Tennis Sunday
